nhc_headline: ...DAMAGING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
summary:
...DAMAGING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
 As of 12:00 PM CST Mon Sep 23
 the center of John was located near 15.1, -98.4
 with movement N at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
